duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach graduate and undergraduate students with a focus on International Politics.
Conduct research and produce scholarly writing in the field of International Politics.
Mentor and guide students in their academic and research pursuits.
Contribute to diversity and inclusion initiatives in research, teaching, and outreach.
Submit required materials including cover letter, CV, research statement, teaching statement, diversity statement, and sample of scholarly writing.
Conduct background check on final candidates for certain faculty and staff positions.

education_certification.credential: PhD at the start of the appointment.
